testimonials.name: Howard Chatman
testimonials.quote: Eros is more than a great teacher and leader â€“ he's a great man of God, a dedicated family man, and a true friend. His passion for developing young barbers and giving back to the community is inspiring. Mystros Barber Academy is a reflection of his heart and vision.

testimonials.name: Darrell Fisher
testimonials.quote: The students at this school are the most talented and professional barbers in the city. I travel to Houston several times a year for work. Mystros is generally my first stop. I walk in looking like Mr. Beasley and leave looking like Shaft. So proud of what you guys are creating.

testimonials.name: Bashari Guidry
testimonials.quote: Mystros Barber Academy is truly a great place with even greater people who care about the community and seeing the youth advance in the Barber career.

testimonials.name: Honeyy Allure
testimonials.quote: Our group home clients get a haircut here monthly. The barbers are patient and really help us take care of the clients grooming needs and wants.

testimonials.name: Zemyra Thompson
testimonials.quote: Today I was looking for someone to taper my hair and googled Mystros Barber Academy and once I entered I was greeted which is a plus for me. My barber was Mr. JustUs and he was assisted by Ms. K who did a wonderful job. I will be back. The customer service was on point.

testimonials.name: Neal Bauman
testimonials.quote: First time going, and was impressed when walking in by the front staff lady, and then it continued with the student that cut my hair.
